name: 羅元隆
objective:
本課程為碩士班結構材料組一年級的核心選修課程。本課程內容著重在了解結構動力學基本原理與分析方法。以大學部的靜力學、材料力學、結構學等相關課程為基礎，進一步了解結構物在受具有時間特性的動態載重下引發的動態反應。本學期課程內容可大致分為：運動方程式、自由振動、強制振動、數值分析方法、反應譜分析、多自由度系統分析、阻尼特性、頻率域分析簡介等。
This course is a core elective designed for first-year graduate students in the Structural Materials division of the Master’s program. The course focuses on the fundamental principles and analytical methods of structural dynamics. Building upon undergraduate-level courses such as statics, mechanics of materials, and structural analysis, students will further explore the dynamic responses of structures subjected to time-dependent loads. The main topics covered during the semester include: Equations of motion, Free vibration, Forced vibration, Numerical analysis methods, Response spectrum analysis, Multi-degree-of-freedom (MDOF) system analysis, Damping characteristics, and Introduction to frequency domain analysis.
schedule:
W01: Equation of Motion, Problem Statement, and Solution Methods
W02: Free Vibration
W03: Response to Harmonic and Periodic Excitations (I)
W04: Response to Harmonic and Periodic Excitations (II)
W05: Response to Arbitrary, Step, and Pulse Excitations (I)
W06: Response to Arbitrary, Step, and Pulse Excitations (II)
W07: Numerical Evaluation of Dynamic Response (I)
W08: Numerical Evaluation of Dynamic Response (II)
W09: Mid-term Examination (Written Test) + Submission of TCWE11 Conference Feedback
W10: Earthquake Response of Linear Systems (I)
W11: Earthquake Response of Linear Systems (II)
W12: Generalized Single-Degree-of-Freedom Systems
W13: Equation of Motion, Problem Statement, and Solution Methods (MDOF)
W14: Free Vibration (MDOF)
W15: Damping in Structures
W16: Dynamic Analysis and Response of Linear Systems
W17: Earthquake Analysis of Linear Systems
W18: Final Examination (Written Test) + Final report submission
